ground_truth: At the front of the store, Desi hangs a Christmas garland, and smiling, Pete nods. With a concerned expression, he rejoins his wife at the counter as Desi faces a middle-aged man. Now, on a backyard trampoline, Debbie's youngest does a flip while Debbie and Sadie look on. Sitting on a toilet, Pete plays online Scrabble until Debbie opens the door. She lifts her brow with a skeptical nod before snatching his computer tablet and leaving. Later, Pete stands onstage, and in the audience, Pete's goateed friend and Barb share a table with Debbie. The silver-haired man in the amber-tinted glasses takes the stage with a backup musician while at the table, Pete sits by his wife, his boyishly ardent gaze fixed on the stage. Debbie sighs as the music producer bobs his head, mouthing along with the lyrics. Debbie turns away discreetly to yawn as Pete briefly lip syncs at her, and Debbie's eyes close. Later, Pete drives his wife home and pulls over as the fire truck passes in the opposite direction. Debbie watches with a smirk as two other emergency vehicles drive by. Back at home, they enter Sadie's room where Debbie takes Sadie's MP3 player, sets it in a dock, and Sadie smiles as her mother dances. Charlotte bounces up and down, and Sadie grins, then bops her head as she gets up and joins them. Looking on, Pete takes a seat as his wife and daughters dance, and standing, Pete replaces Sadie's music player with his own. Debbie and the girls halt, and as his wife and daughters look on, Pete sways awkwardly, letting his head rock side to side. Debbie gestures toward their glum-faced daughters, and eyeing them, Pete takes his music player from the speaker dock. In the morning, Debbie rushes to the kitchen island, where Pete eats breakfast with the girls, and preparing their lunches, she glares at her husband. Later, Charlotte runs upstairs at a school as Debbie and Charlotte pass a pregnant woman with long, gray hair. They reach a classroom where Debbie hugs an old woman. Later, Debbie ducks down in her car as she smokes a cigarette, blowing smoke out the window and pulling away. Now, a laptop shows a young Graham Parker performing in his heyday, and Pete watches with a mustached 30-something and a hip, young woman. He glances toward his office where Graham heads out. Now, at a home office, Pete plucks a sitar. At night, Debbie faces a laptop as she and Pete lounge in bed, viewing video from the store where Desi's hook-up takes her from behind. Debbie averts her face and hits Pete with a pillow. Now, Charlotte bounces in the doorway across the bathroom between the girls' rooms, and her own hand snatches her out of view as she collapses with her feet sticking out.

Watching, Pete takes a chair as his wife and daughters dance, and standing, Pete replaces Sadie's music player with his own. Debbie and the girls pause, and as his wife and daughters watch, Pete sways awkwardly, letting his head rock side to side. Debbie gestures toward their glum-faced daughters, and eyeing them, Pete takes his music player from the speaker dock. test_cases.name: Brevity - L1

In the backyard, Debbie's youngest flips on a trampoline as Debbie and Sadie watch. Pete plays online Scrabble on the toilet until Debbie opens the door, skeptically nods, takes his tablet, and leaves. Debbie sighs as the music producer mouths lyrics, then yawns as Pete lip syncs at her. Driving home, Pete pulls over for a fire truck, and Debbie smirks as more emergency vehicles pass. At night, Debbie and Pete watch store video of Desi's hook-up, and Debbie hits Pete with a pillow. Charlotte bounces in the doorway, then collapses with her feet sticking out.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: At the very front of the bustling store, Desi carefully hangs a festive Christmas garland, and with a warm smile, Pete gives her an approving nod. With a concerned expression on his face, he returns to join his wife at the counter, while Desi turns to face a middle-aged man. Meanwhile, in the backyard, Debbie's youngest child energetically performs a flip on the trampoline as Debbie and Sadie watch with interest. Sitting comfortably on a toilet, Pete is absorbed in playing online Scrabble until Debbie suddenly opens the door. She raises her brow with a skeptical nod before swiftly snatching his computer tablet and leaving the room. Later on, Pete finds himself standing onstage, and in the audience, Pete's friend with a goatee and Barb are seated at a table with Debbie. Debbie lets out a sigh as the music producer bobs his head, mouthing along with the lyrics. Discreetly, Debbie turns away to stifle a yawn as Pete briefly lip syncs at her, and Debbie's eyes slowly close. Later, Pete drives his wife home and pulls over to the side of the road as a fire truck speeds past in the opposite direction. Debbie watches with a smirk as two additional emergency vehicles drive by. Back at home, they enter Sadie's room, where Debbie takes Sadie's MP3 player and sets it in a dock, prompting Sadie to smile as her mother begins to dance. Charlotte bounces up and down with excitement, and Sadie grins, then bops her head as she gets up to join them. Observing the scene, Pete takes a seat as his wife and daughters dance joyfully, and then, standing up, Pete replaces Sadie's music player with his own. Debbie and the girls come to a halt, and as his wife and daughters look on, Pete sways awkwardly, letting his head rock from side to side. Debbie gestures toward their glum-faced daughters, and eyeing them, Pete removes his music player from the speaker dock. In the morning, Debbie rushes to the kitchen island, where Pete is eating breakfast with the girls, and as she prepares their lunches, she glares at her husband. Later, Charlotte runs energetically upstairs at a school as Debbie and Charlotte pass by a pregnant woman with long, gray hair. They reach a classroom where Debbie warmly hugs an old woman. Later, Debbie ducks down in her car as she smokes a cigarette, blowing smoke out the window before pulling away. Now, a laptop screen shows a young Graham Parker performing during his heyday, and Pete watches alongside a mustached 30-something and a hip, young woman. He glances toward his office where Graham is heading out. Now, in a home office, Pete plucks at a sitar. At night, Debbie faces a laptop as she and Pete lounge in bed, watching video footage from the store where Desi's hook-up takes her from behind. Debbie turns her face away and playfully hits Pete with a pillow. Now, Charlotte bounces energetically in the doorway across the bathroom between the girls' rooms, and her own hand quickly snatches her out of view as she collapses with her feet sticking out.

At this point, a laptop screen displays footage of a young Graham Parker performing during the pinnacle of his career, and Pete watches intently alongside a mustached thirty-something and a hip, young woman. test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: At the front of the store, Desi carefully positions a Christmas garland, ensuring it hangs just right, while Pete, standing nearby, observes her work with a smile and nods in approval. With a shift in his demeanor, Pete's expression turns concerned as he makes his way back to the counter to rejoin his wife, while Desi turns her attention to a middle-aged man who has approached. Meanwhile, in a different setting, Debbie's youngest child energetically bounces on a backyard trampoline, executing a flip in mid-air as Debbie and Sadie watch with interest. In a more private moment, Pete is seated on a toilet, deeply engrossed in a game of online Scrabble on his computer tablet, until Debbie suddenly opens the door, catching him off guard. She raises her brow, giving him a skeptical nod, before decisively snatching the tablet from his hands and leaving the room. Later, Pete finds himself standing onstage, and in the audience, his goateed friend and Barb are seated at a table with Debbie. A silver-haired man, wearing amber-tinted glasses, takes the stage accompanied by a backup musician, while at the table, Pete sits beside his wife, his gaze fixed intently on the performance with a boyish enthusiasm. As the music producer bobs his head in time with the music, mouthing the lyrics, Debbie lets out a sigh, turning away discreetly to stifle a yawn, while Pete briefly lip syncs the words in her direction, causing her eyes to close momentarily. Later, as Pete drives his wife home, he pulls the car over to the side of the road to allow a fire truck to pass by in the opposite direction. Debbie watches with a smirk as two additional emergency vehicles follow closely behind. Once back at home, they enter Sadie's room, where Debbie takes Sadie's MP3 player and places it in a dock, prompting Sadie to smile as her mother begins to dance. Charlotte starts bouncing up and down, and Sadie, grinning, bops her head to the rhythm before getting up to join them. Observing the scene, Pete takes a seat, watching as his wife and daughters dance together, and then stands to replace Sadie's music player with his own. Debbie and the girls come to a halt, and as they look on, Pete sways awkwardly to the music, letting his head rock from side to side. Debbie gestures toward their daughters, who wear glum expressions, and noticing this, Pete retrieves his music player from the speaker dock. The next morning, Debbie rushes to the kitchen island, where Pete is already seated, eating breakfast with the girls, and as she prepares their lunches, she shoots a glare at her husband. Later, Charlotte runs up the stairs at school, with Debbie following closely behind, and they pass a pregnant woman with long, gray hair. They reach a classroom where Debbie warmly embraces an old woman. Later, Debbie is in her car, ducking down as she smokes a cigarette, exhaling the smoke out the window before driving away. Meanwhile, a laptop screen displays footage of a young Graham Parker performing during his prime, and Pete watches alongside a mustached 30-something and a hip, young woman. He glances toward his office, noticing Graham heading out. In a home office setting, Pete plucks the strings of a sitar, creating a melodic sound. At night, Debbie and Pete are lounging in bed, facing a laptop that plays video footage from the store, showing Desi's hook-up taking her from behind. Debbie turns her face away from the screen, then playfully hits Pete with a pillow. In another moment, Charlotte is seen bouncing in the doorway across the bathroom between the girls' rooms, and suddenly, her own hand reaches out to snatch her out of view as she collapses, leaving her feet sticking out.

Meanwhile, in the backyard, Debbie and Sadie watch as Debbie's youngest flips on a trampoline. In the bathroom, Pete plays online Scrabble until Debbie interrupts, skeptically taking his tablet. Finally, Charlotte bounces in the doorway across the bathroom, disappearing as she collapses with her feet sticking out.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: At the front of the store, Desi hangs a Christmas garland, typically used to signify the festive season with its colorful lights and evergreen branches, and smiling, Pete nods approvingly. With a concerned expression reminiscent of someone noticing a familiar problem, he rejoins his wife at the counter as Desi faces a middle-aged man who appears to be browsing nearby. Now, on a large backyard trampoline that was a popular birthday gift for Debbie's youngest, the child does a flip while Debbie and Sadie look on with amused delight. Sitting on a toilet in the small bathroom connected to their bedroom, Pete plays online Scrabble, a popular word puzzle game, until Debbie opens the door with mild annoyance. She lifts her brow with a skeptical nod before snatching his computer tablet, one of the latest models, and leaving. Later, Pete stands onstage at a local community theater event, and in the audience, Pete's goateed friend and Barb, who are regular patrons of these events, share a table with Debbie. The silver-haired man wearing distinctive amber-tinted glasses, often used for reducing glare, takes the stage with a backup musician known in local circles, while at the table, Pete sits by his wife, his boyishly ardent gaze fixed on the performer. Debbie sighs as the music producer, recognized for discovering emerging talent, bobs his head, mouthing along with the lyrics. Debbie turns away discreetly to yawn as Pete, caught up in the moment, briefly lip syncs at her, and Debbie's eyes close in momentary fatigue. Later, Pete drives his wife home through the quiet suburban streets and pulls over as the fire truck, with its sirens blaring, passes in the opposite direction. Debbie watches with a smirk as two other emergency vehicles, likely heading to the same location, drive by. Back at home, they enter Sadie's room where Debbie takes Sadie's MP3 player, recently loaded with her favorite tunes, sets it in a dock, and Sadie smiles as her mother dances to the beat. Charlotte bounces up and down in excitement, and Sadie grins, then bops her head as she gets up and joins them in their impromptu dance party. Looking on, Pete takes a seat as his wife and daughters dance energetically, and standing, Pete replaces Sadie's music player with his own selection, a classic rock playlist. Debbie and the girls halt, and as his wife and daughters look on, Pete sways awkwardly, letting his head rock side to side in a humorous attempt to fit into their groove. Debbie gestures toward their glum-faced daughters, who look unimpressed, and eyeing them, Pete takes his music player from the speaker dock with a sheepish smile. In the morning, Debbie rushes to the kitchen island, where Pete eats breakfast with the girls, and preparing their lunches, she glares at her husband, hinting at her frustration over his laid-back attitude. Later, Charlotte runs upstairs at a school known for its innovative programs, as Debbie and Charlotte pass a pregnant woman with long, gray hair, perhaps a faculty member or a fellow parent. They reach a classroom where Debbie hugs an old woman, likely a beloved teacher or a family friend. Later, Debbie ducks down in her car as she smokes a cigarette, a habit she's trying to quit, blowing smoke out the window and pulling away with a sigh. Now, a laptop shows a young Graham Parker, a British rock singer-songwriter known for his energetic performances, performing in his heyday, and Pete watches with a mustached 30-something and a hip, young woman, both colleagues from work. He glances toward his office where Graham, after finishing a brief session, heads out. Now, at a home office, Pete plucks a sitar, an instrument that shows his eclectic taste in music. At night, Debbie faces a laptop as she and Pete lounge in bed, viewing video from the store where Desi's hook-up, a scene captured on the security camera, takes her from behind. Debbie averts her face, embarrassed by the intrusion, and hits Pete with a pillow playfully. Now, Charlotte bounces in the doorway across the bathroom between the girls' rooms, and her own hand snatches her out of view as she collapses with her feet sticking out in a playful tumble.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: At the front of the store Desi hangs a Christmas garland and smiling Pete nods. With a concerned expression he rejoins his wife at the counter as Desi faces a middleaged man. Now on a backyard trampoline Debbie's youngest does a flip while Debbie and Sadie look on. Sitting on a toilet. Pete plays online Scrabble until Debbie opens the door. She lifts her brow with a skeptical nod before snatching his computer tablet and leaving. Later Pete stands onstage and in the audience. Pete's goateed friend and Barb share a table with Debbie. The silverhaired man in the ambertinted glasses takes the stage with a backup musician. while at the table. Pete sits by his wife his boyishly ardent gaze fixed on the stage. Debbie sighs as the music producer bobs his head mouthing along with the lyrics. Debbie turns away discreetly to yawn as Pete briefly lip syncs at her and Debbie's eyes close. Later Pete drives his wife home and pulls over as the fire truck passes in the opposite direction. Debbie watches with a smirk as two other emergency vehicles drive by. Back at home they enter Sadie's room where Debbie takes Sadie's MP3 player sets it in a dock and Sadie smiles as her mother dances. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Charlotte bounces up and down and Sadie grins. then bops her head as she gets up and joins them. Looking on Pete takes a seat as his wife and daughters dance and standing. Pete replaces Sadie's music player with his own. Debbie and the girls halt and as his wife and daughters look on Pete sways awkwardly letting his head rock side to side. Debbie gestures toward their glumfaced daughters and eyeing them. Pete takes his music player from the speaker dock. In the morning Debbie rushes to the kitchen island where Pete eats breakfast with the girls and preparing their lunches she glares at her husband. Later Charlotte runs upstairs at a school as Debbie and Charlotte pass a pregnant woman with long gray hair. They reach a classroom where Debbie hugs an old woman. Later Debbie ducks down in her car as she smokes a cigarette blowing smoke out the window and pulling away. Now a laptop shows a young Graham Parker performing in his heyday and Pete watches with a mustached 30something and a hip young woman. He glances toward his office where Graham heads out. Now at a home office Pete plucks a sitar. At night Debbie faces a laptop as she and Pete lounge in bed viewing video from the store where Desi's hookup takes her from behind. Debbie averts her face and hits Pete with a pillow. Now Charlotte bounces in the doorway across the bathroom between the girls' rooms and her own hand snatches her out of view as she collapses with her feet sticking out.

Now on a backyard trampoline Debbie's youngest does a flip while Debbie and Sadie look on. Now at a home office Pete plucks a sitar. At night Debbie faces a laptop as she and Pete lounge in bed viewing video from the store where Desi's hookup takes her from behind. Debbie averts her face and hits Pete with a pillow. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: At the edge of the field, a cat juggles a birthday balloon, and chuckling, a fox winks. With a puzzled look, it rejoins its sibling at the tree as the cat faces a young giraffe. Now, on a sandy beach, the pelican's eldest does a cartwheel while the pelican and the lobster observe. Perched on a fence, the fox plays virtual chess until the pelican opens the gate. The pelican raises its wing with a curious shrug before grabbing its game console and leaving. Later, the fox sits on a rooftop, and in the courtyard, the fox's freckled pal and the monkey share a bench with the pelican. The bald eagle in the rose-colored goggles takes the rooftop with a sidekick artist while on the bench, the fox lounges by its sibling, its childishly eager gaze locked on the rooftop. The pelican groans as the songbird wiggles its beak, lip-syncing along with the tune. The pelican rotates away subtly to stretch as the fox quietly mimics at it, and the pelican's eyes close. Later, the fox rolls its sibling to the park and halts as the marching band parades in the opposite lane. The pelican observes with a grin as two other floats pass by. Back in the nest, they enter the sparrow's corner where the pelican grabs the sparrow's cassette player, sets it in a cradle, and the sparrow giggles as its parent grooves. Clementine hops up and down, and the sparrow beams, then bobs its beak as it leaps up and mingles with them. Observing quietly, the fox crouches down as its sibling and kids sway, and standing, the fox swaps the sparrow's cassette deck with its own. The pelican and chicks freeze, and as its sibling and kids observe, the fox sways clumsily, letting its antennae sway to and fro. The pelican signals toward their frowning chicks, and noting them, the fox removes its cassette deck from the cradle. At dawn, the pelican dashes to the granite slab, where the fox nibbles brunch with the chicks, and assembling their snacks, it scowls at its mate. Later, Clementine scurries upstairs at a library as the pelican and Clementine stroll past a glowing lizard with short, purple feathers. They arrive at a cave where the pelican embraces an ancient lizard. Later, the pelican crouches low in its den as it munches a pretzel, exhaling crumbs out the door and driving away. Now, a tablet displays a teenage Leonardo DiCaprio acting in his prime, and the fox gawks with a goateed 20-something and a trendy, young crab. It peers toward its study where Leonardo slips out. Now, in a treehouse, the fox plucks a ukulele. At dusk, the pelican stares at a tablet as it and the fox recline in a hammock, viewing footage from the field where the cat’s acquaintance hugs it from the front. The pelican turns its eyes and swats the fox with a cushion. Now, Clementine hops in the doorway beyond the pantry between the chicks' spaces, and its own claw pulls it from sight as it crumples with its wings peeking out.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: At the front of the store, Desi hangs a Christmas garland while Pete rejoins his wife. In the backyard, Debbie and Sadie watch a flip on a trampoline. Pete plays online Scrabble until Debbie takes his tablet away. Later, Pete performs on stage, catching Debbie's tired attention. On the drive home, emergency vehicles pass by, amusing Debbie. At home, a family dance session begins, interrupted when Pete changes the music, ending the moment. The next morning, Debbie rushes to prepare lunches, glaring at Pete. At school, Debbie hugs a woman before leaving to smoke. Pete watches old Graham Parker footage with colleagues. Later, he plays a sitar at home while Debbie cringes at Desi’s store video, playfully hitting Pete with a pillow. Finally, Charlotte bounces in and out of the bathroom, leaving only her feet visible.
